SafetyInspectionBy: City of Vernon  Health & Env. Control Dep.

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
RMP EXECUTIVE SUMMARY

Executive Summary Component should include:

?    The accidental release prevention and emergency response policies at the stationary source 

?    The stationary source and regulated substances handled; 

?    The general accidental release prevention program and chemical-specific prevention steps; 

?    The five-year accident history; 

?    The emergency response program; and, 

?    Planned changes to improve safety



The sections below summarize the Executive Summary.



Accidental Release Prevention Policies

Lineage Logistics - Bandini, Vernon Facility has a long standing commitment to worker, public and environmental safety. This commitment is demonstrated by the resources invested in accident prevention, such as personnel training and consideration of safety in the design, operation, and maintenance of the ammonia refrigeration system.  



Lineage Logistics - Bandini, Vernon Facility's policy is to implement reasonable controls to prevent foreseeable releases of regulated substance.



Stationary Source and Regulated Substance Handled

Lineage Logistics - Bandini, Vernon Facility is located at at 4100 Bandini Boulevard in Vernon, California, and is situated approximately 0.9 miles west of the 710 freeway and 1.2 miles south of the I-5 freeway.  The immediate area surrounding the facility is primarily commercial and residential. The facility was constructed and began operations in 2001. 

The regulated substance handled at the facility is anhydrous ammonia. The facility's primary activities revolve around large-scale public storage of food products. All of the ammonia inventory is used as refrigerant.



Accidental Release Prevention Program

As part of the implementation of this CalARP Program, key Prevention Program elements were documented and implemented by Lineage Logistics - Bandini, Vernon Facility to manage process safety issues associated with the use of anhydrous ammonia.  Furthermore, common industry standards, policies, and procedures are

currently utilized to ensure safe practices are being performed.



The regulated substance is over the 500-lbs. state threshold for CalARP Program and the 10,000-lbs. federal threshold for EPA RMP and Cal-OSHA PSM.  As a result, the anhydrous ammonia covered process (ammonia refrigeration system) is subject to RMP Program 3.



Program 3 Prevention Program Elements include:

?    Process Safety Information

?    Process Hazard Analysis

?    Operating Procedures

?    Training

?    Mechanical Integrity

?    Management Of Change

?    Pre-Start Safety Review

?    Compliance Audit

?    Incident Investigation

?    Employee Participation

?    Hot Work Permit

?    Contractors

?    Trade Secrets





Five-Year Accident History

 Lineage Logistics - Bandini, Vernon Facility has had no releases in the last five years (December 2011 - December 2016) that meets the five-year accident history reporting criteria, therefore no data is required. 





Emergency Response Program

In addition, Lineage Logistics - Bandini, Vernon Facility has an Emergency Action Plan (EAP) in place to properly prepare for emergency evacuations, to provide first aid and medical treatment and to contact federal, state and local officials in the event of a major release of ammonia. The Facility Emergency Response Plan is coordinated with the local responding units, such as the fire department or HAZMAT Team.  A current copy of the EAP and Crisis Management Plan, that includes ammonia responses, can be found with the Plant Manager or Facility Maintenance Manager.





Planned Changes to Improve Safety

Several studies have been conducted to examine mitigation measures to improve safety at the facility.  These studies include:

?    A Process Hazard Analysis (PHA) revalidation was performed in October 25, 2016.

?    A Hazard Assessment, performed in December 2016.

?    Seismic Assessment was performed on December 2016.

Any outstanding recommendations from these studies and the target completion date or closure have been provided within ea
